headline: Charter Communications (CHTR) Declined Following Weak Results
summary: Oakmark Funds, advised by Harris Associates, released its “Oakmark Equity and Income Fund” Q3 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the quarter, the Fund (Class I Shares) underperformed the 60% S&P 500 / 40% Bloomberg U.S. Aggregate Bond Index and outperformed the benchmark since inception. The equity portfolio returned […]
